H0.text: In order to secure the help of the Wizard, whose broom must Dorothy steal in the Wizard of Oz. The Wizard himself

H1.text: In order to secure the help of the Wizard, whose broom must Dorothy steal in the Wizard of Oz. Glinda the Good Witch

H2.text: In order to secure the help of the Wizard, whose broom must Dorothy steal in the Wizard of Oz. The Nome King

H3.text: In order to secure the help of the Wizard, whose broom must Dorothy steal in the Wizard of Oz. Wicked witch

A4.text: The Wizard demands the destruction of the Witch, with her broom as proof, in exchange for granting the wishes of Dorothy and her companions.

A5.text: Glinda remotely counteracts the spell with snowfall.
